GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an articles specified by article_id parameter

article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the vote count of article specified by article_id parameter and responds with updated article

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for the specified article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: insert a comment and respond with the posted comment object

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: delete a comment and respond with the empty object
